entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 6:15 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: SE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
